author: Envestnet
description: Build task to (re-)create VSTS build definitions for TFVC in TFS (2017 Update 2) from provided (directory of) tokenized JSON file(s)

inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional postfix to append to names of created build definitions
inputs.label: Definition Name Postfix
inputs.name: defnamepostfix

inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of TFS API to use
inputs.label: TFS API Version Number
inputs.name: tfsapiversionnumber

inputs.helpMarkDown: Branch TFVC path token to replace with Base TFVC Path plus Branch Name
inputs.label: Branch Path Token
inputs.name: branchpathtoken

inputs.helpMarkDown: Branch name token to replace in input JSON file
inputs.label: Branch Name Token
inputs.name: branchnametoken

inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory or file to read in JSON build definitions; example values: C:/BuildDefinitions/ or C:/BuildDefinitions/Def.json
inputs.label: File Path
inputs.name: filepath

name: TamaracBuildSynchronizer
